entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. Forecast issued 09:15 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 09:15 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 09:15 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
